channel.title: Pkill on A Developer's Experience
channel.description: Recent content in Pkill on A Developer's Experience

item.title: Keep Killing It
item.description: There are times when even decent chaps have to pick up the sword and fight. I am talking about times when some process on your machine is always peeking over your shoulder. Worst part, consumes a lot of resources, especially CPU time, and obstructs your productivity. Or peace of mind. For such cases, I give you slay
